title: Hidden promiscuity elucidates the enigmatic relationship between duckweed accessions
content: This article comments on:Braglia L, Ceschin S, Iannelli MA, Bog M, Fabriani M, Frugis G, Gavazzi F, Gianì S, Mariani F, Muzzi M, Pelella E, Morello L. 2024. Characterization of the cryptic interspecific hybrid Lemna×mediterranea by an integrated approach provides new insights into duckweed diversity. Journal of Experimental Botany 75, 3092–3110.
siteTitle: Journal of Experimental Botany Current Issue
